metadata.name: Suspicious IIS Module Registration
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious IIS module registration as described in Microsoft threat report on IIS backdoors

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\w3wp.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('appcmd.exe add module')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' system.enterpriseservices.internal.publish')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gacutil')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i'))))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious IIS module registration as described in Microsoft threat report on IIS backdoors
